body:
So Idk if many of you know but the youtuber CreeperFarts released a video on Competitive Minecraft.

I would have put his video link but I'm on my phone (will put link later).

And I was wondering to see as everyone is creating teams, why not make an Avicus team.

Again this will take planning and isn't completely official yet.

If you think you would be interested msg me on Skype or reply here. I'm still thinking about a name for the team if this goes somewhere if you have any suggestions for a good team name please feel free to tell me. 

Thanks and Peace Out :P
body_tagged:

title: Competitive Minecraft.

replies.body: We have avicus teams? You mean like a whole-server team?
replies.body_tagged: We have avicus teams? You mean like a whole-server team?

replies.body:
This is about Team Flux right?
I think it's pretty ignorant of them to claim that they're the first competitve Minecraft team.

Avicus has just finished their 2nd tournament.
Overcast is just starting their 11th tournament.

They're a bit late xD

replies.body:
@Rilo yes I mean players from this server to go against Team Flux and other big teams like that.

@Snow Yeah I get were your coming from but there having tournaments on different servers, and from teams from servers. Like there are already 2 big teams from the MCSG server, I've heard rumors of a Mineplex and Hypixel one forming so why not have an Avicus one form?

replies.body: hey I got temp banned and I want to know how to get back n or make an appeal
replies.body_tagged: hey I got temp banned and I want to know how to get back n or make an appeal

replies.body: You have to wait out. You can only appeal if the ban was wrong/false.
replies.body_tagged: You have to wait out. You can only appeal if the ban was wrong/false.

reply_to.body: hey I got temp banned and I want to know how to get back n or make an appeal
reply_to.body_tagged: hey I got temp banned and I want to know how to get back n or make an appeal

replies.body: how do you appeal I think it was wrong
replies.body_tagged: how do you appeal I think it was wrong

replies.body: Go to the sub forum Appeal an Infraction. Click create a new discussion, follow the format given and state why it was wrong.
replies.body_tagged: Go to the sub forum Appeal an Infraction. Click create a new discussion, follow the format given and state why it was wrong.
